statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews;
SELECT id, attendee_id, festival_id, feedback, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE id = 1;
SELECT feedback, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, feedback FROM feedback_reviews WHERE festival_id = 2;
SELECT id, rating, feedback FROM feedback_reviews;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT feedback, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE attendee_id = 100 AND festival_id = 20;
SELECT * FROM feedback_reviews WHERE rating <= 2 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, feedback, rating FROM feedback_reviews WHERE attendee_id = 50 AND festival_id = 10 ORDER BY rating DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT attendee_id, festival_id FROM reviews WHERE review_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, rating FROM feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT review_text FROM reviews WHERE attendee_id = 100 AND festival_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT attendee_id, festival_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE festival_id = 123 AND rating <= 5;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM feedback WHERE attendee_id = 456 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT review_id, review_text FROM reviews WHERE attendee_id = 789 AND festival_id = 456 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT attendee_name, rating, review FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, date_submitted FROM feedback ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT * FROM festival WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date FROM festival ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, attendee_name, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT festival_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM festival WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT feedback_id, rating, review FROM feedback WHERE review IS NOT NULL ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT * FROM improvements WHERE implemented = False ORDER BY implementation_date ASC;
SELECT id, attendee_name, festival_name, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback;
SELECT * FROM review ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text FROM review WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT suggestion_text FROM suggestion WHERE LENGTH(suggestion_text) > 50;
SELECT feedback.id, feedback.attendee_name, suggestion.suggestion_text FROM feedback JOIN suggestion ON feedback.id = suggestion.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT attendee_name, festival_name, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM review WHERE reviewer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, suggestion_text FROM suggestion ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT f.attendee_name, r.reviewer_name, s.suggestion_text FROM feedback f JOIN review r ON f.id = r.feedback_id JOIN suggestion s ON f.id = s.feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT attendee_name, rating, comments FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM festivals WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT festival_name, start_date, end_date FROM festivals ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT organizer_name, email FROM organizers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, festival_name, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating < 3 AND feedback_id > 5;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comments FROM feedback WHERE comments LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT festival_name FROM feedback;
SELECT * FROM festivals WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
